description.en:
Akropolis’ mission is to give everyone the tools to save, grow and provision for the future safely and without dependence on a central counterparty, or to fall prey to predatory financial practices of multiple intermediaries. 
Our goal is to create yield-generating products that don’t predominantly rely on inflationary emissions as the main source of yield and that generate returns regardless of the market conditions.
We believe Akropolis is the one-stop solution for any investor seeking access to passive, efficient and sustainable yield generation.

status_updates.description:
We are delighted to share that Alameda Ventures has invested and will become the first institutional liquidity provider to Akropolis’ yield aggregator Delphi currently at ca.$20mn TVL following our recent launch!
https://twitter.com/akropolisio/status/1301895563110211586

Joining REN Alliance to add native $BTC support into Delphi
https://twitter.com/akropolisio/status/1296798834228637696?s=20

Delphi Beta is live on mainnet 🥳  🥳  🥳

https://medium.com/akropolis/delphi-beta-is-live-on-mainnet-e39b60e17337

Announcing Early Access Lottery for Delphi pre-audit capped launch 🥳 🥳 🥳
https://twitter.com/akropolisio/status/1292491381156589570
